title: Trump warns against AI 'overregulation,' says US needs to have one federal standard
description: President Donald Trump advocates for a unified federal standard for artificial intelligence regulation. He warns that a fragmented approach with 50 state-specific rules could stifle growth and allow China to surpass the United States in the AI race.
content:

title: ETtech Interview: Lightspeed’s Ravi Mahtre & Bejul Somaia on the AI bubble, India opportunity & more
description: Lightspeed Venture Partners, a leading Silicon Valley-based investment firm, is of the view despite the current valuation "euphoria" in artificial intelligence (AI), the technology represents a once-in-a-generation transformation that will rewire all sectors and businesses.

title: Energy Department loans USD 1B to help finance restart of nuclear reactor on Three Mile Island
description: The US Department of Energy said Tuesday that it will loan USD 1 billion to help finance the restart of the nuclear power plant on Pennsylvanias Three Mile Island that is under contract to supply power to data centers for tech giant Microsoft.The loan is in line with the priorities of President Donald Trumps administration, including bolstering nuclear power and artificial intelligence.
content:

title: US stocks lose ground, gold resumes its climb as risk appetite sours
description: NEW YORK: Wall Street stocks closed sharply lower on Tuesday, extending a selloff prompted in part by the run-up to Nvidia earnings, which could test the artificial intelligence boom amid mounting valuation concerns.
content:
NEW YORK: Wall Street stocks closed sharply lower on Tuesday, extending a selloff prompted in part by the run-up to Nvidia earnings, which could test the artificial intelligence boom amid mounting valuation concerns.

title: Google boss warns 'no company would be immune' if artificial intelligence stock market bubble bursts
description:
THE boss of Google has warned “no company would be immune” if the artificial intelligence stock market bubble was to burst.

content:
THE boss of Google has warned “no company would be immune” if the artificial intelligence stock market bubble was to burst.
Sundar Pichai admitted there was an “irrationality” in the AI-fuelled stock price rise of hundreds of companies.

title: Trump warns against AI 'overregulation,' says US needs to have one federal standard
description: President Donald Trump said on Tuesday the U.S. must have one federal standard for regulating artificial intelligence, saying the technology risked being over-regulated if each American state came up with its own standard.
